entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 6:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 8.4°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
